home.title: About Hologramview Technologies
home.subtitle: Hologramview Technologies is a software innovation company dedicated to building applications that transform industries and empower individuals.
home.mission: Our mission is to combine creativity, intelligence, and usability into software solutions that make technology more human-centered and future-ready.
home.focusTitle: We focus on creating tools for:

aiTechnology.title: AI Technology Platforms
aiTechnology.description: Advancing creativity and productivity with intelligent applications.

travel.title: Travel & Exploration
travel.description: Enabling people to discover the world through immersive and data-driven tools.

music.title: Music & Creativity
music.description: Building platforms that inspire creators and innovators.

education.title: Education & Learning
education.description: Reimagining how people learn, connect, and grow.

productivity.title: Productivity Tools
productivity.description: Designing extensions and apps that simplify work on Windows, macOS, and Chrome.

aiStudioChain.name: AI Studio Chain
aiStudioChain.description: An AI-powered IDE and chat interface built for developers and vibecoders. Combines smart code assistance, real-time collaboration, and generative AI tools.
aiStudioChain.shortDesc: AI IDE + chat interface for developers.

dynamicWorldExplorer.name: Dynamic World Explorer
dynamicWorldExplorer.description: A data-rich discovery platform that brings travel, culture, and world insights together in one interactive space.
dynamicWorldExplorer.shortDesc: Global insights for travel and culture.

floatlearn.name: Floatlearn
floatlearn.description: An innovative floating learning system that teaches you while you work, blending micro-learning with productivity.
floatlearn.shortDesc: Floating learning system while you work.

spaceChoices.name: Space Choices
spaceChoices.description: A productivity tool that chooses screens fast and lets you save window states and sessions.
spaceChoices.shortDesc: Save and switch window states instantly.

tigerSimfoniPortal.name: Tiger Simfoni Portal
tigerSimfoniPortal.description: A training platform simulator for travel industry students to practice for important exams.

scholare.name: Scholare
scholare.description: An education meeting point that connects teachers and students of many disciplines.

footer.description: We create innovative digital solutions tailored to your needs. From custom software to AI implementation, we build technology that transforms businesses.

services.subtitle: Comprehensive technology solutions for modern businesses
services.heroDescription: At Hologramview Technologies, we create innovative digital solutions tailored to your needs.
services.weDesignSubtitle: From concept to deployment, we deliver comprehensive digital solutions
services.contactDescription: Ready to bring your digital vision to life? Let's discuss your project.

customSoftware.description: Tailored software solutions built from the ground up to meet your specific business requirements and workflows.

webpages.name: Webpages
webpages.description: Modern, responsive websites that showcase your brand and engage your audience across all devices.

softwareSystems.description: Complex enterprise-grade systems designed to streamline operations and boost productivity.

about.title: About Us
about.teamQuote: At Hologramview Technologies, we don't just build software—we build experiences that expand what's possible in work, learning, and exploration.
